page.title: 19LEVEN VALLEY - BUILDINGS
page.content: BUILDINGS ARE USUALLY FARMS OR FARM COTTAGES. FARMHOUSES TEND TO BE LARGE COLD BUILDINGS SO SOME FARMERS HAVE BUILT MODERN INSULATED BUNGALOWS AS REPLACEMENTS. FARM COTTAGES ARE SMALL SO OCCASIONALLY SOME HAVE BEEN JOINED TOGETHER AS LIVING STANDARDS HAVE INCREASED. OTHER HOUSES CLOSE TO THE ROADS HAVE BEEN BOUGHT BY WOULD BE COMMUTERS AND RENOVATED USING LOCAL AUTHORITY GRANTS BUILDINGS TEND TO BE OF LOCAL DARK GREY STONE ALTHOUGH SOME FARMHOUSES AND FARM COTTAGES ARE WHITEWASHED. THERE ARE VERY FEW DERELICT BUILDINGS AS THE AREA IS ON THE FRINGES OF GLENROTHES. NEW FARM BUILDINGS ARE A RESULT OF FARMING PROSPERITY IN THE EEC.LARGE NEW BARNS HAVE CORRUGATED IRON ROOFS & SIDES ARE OF 'BREEZE'BLOCK OR BRICK THE FLOORS ARE LAID WITH CONCRETE.
